code: @Override public boolean matches(Method method, Class<?> targetClass) {     return true. }
@Override public boolean matches(Method method, Class<?> targetClass, Object... args) {     // Should never be invoked as isRuntime returns false.     throw new UnsupportedOperationException(). }

comment: /**  * Required to support serialization. Replaces with canonical  * instance on deserialization, protecting Singleton pattern.  * Alternative to overriding {@code equals()}.  */
code: /**  * Required to support serialization. Replaces with canonical  * instance on deserialization, protecting Singleton pattern.  * Alternative to overriding {@code equals()}.  */ private Object readResolve() {     return INSTANCE. }
